entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 early this evening then north 30 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023
